statements: SELECT * FROM permits WHERE permit_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, permit_type FROM permits WHERE issue_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM permits WHERE expiration_date IS NULL;
SELECT project_name, regulatory_agency FROM permits WHERE permit_type = 'Construction';
SELECT * FROM permits WHERE regulatory_agency = 'City Planning Department' ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM permits WHERE permit_type = 'Building' ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, regulatory_agency FROM permits WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01' AND permit_type = 'Environmental' ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM permits WHERE regulatory_agency = 'EPA' AND issue_date >= '2021-06-01' ORDER BY permit_id ASC;
SELECT project_name, issue_date, expiration_date FROM permits WHERE permit_type = 'Renovation' AND regulatory_agency = 'DOE';
SELECT permit_id, project_name, permit_type, issue_date, regulatory_agency FROM permits WHERE expiration_date IS NULL ORDER BY project_name DESC, issue_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM permits;
SELECT project_name, expiration_date, permit_status FROM permits WHERE permit_status = 'Active';
SELECT owner_name, project_name FROM permits WHERE issue_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_type = 'Environmental Report';
SELECT document_id, document_type, document_date FROM compliance_documents ORDER BY document_date DESC;
SELECT owner_name, project_name, permit_status, issue_date, expiration_date FROM permits WHERE permit_status='approved' ORDER BY issue_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM permits WHERE owner_name LIKE '%John%' AND permit_status='active' ORDER BY permit_id;
SELECT project_name, owner_name, permit_status, issue_date, expiration_date FROM permits WHERE expiration_date <= '2023-12-31' AND permit_status='expired';

SELECT project_name, permit_status, issue_date, expiration_date, owner_name FROM permits INNER JOIN compliance_documents ON permits.permit_id = compliance_documents.permit_id WHERE compliance_documents.document_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY compliance_documents.document_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT owner_name, project_name, permit_status, issue_date, expiration_date FROM permits WHERE permit_status IN ('approved', 'pending') AND issue_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM permits;
SELECT project_name, permit_type FROM permits WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_name, issue_date FROM permits WHERE permit_type = 'Renovation';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_docs ORDER BY doc_name ASC;
SELECT doc_name, doc_type FROM regulatory_docs WHERE project_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM permits;
SELECT project_name, issue_date FROM permits WHERE permit_type='Building';
SELECT doc_name, doc_type, project_id FROM regulatory_docs ORDER BY doc_name ASC;
SELECT inspection_date, inspector_name FROM inspections WHERE project_id=1002 AND inspection_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;

SELECT permits.permit_id, regulatory_docs.doc_name, inspections.inspection_date FROM permits INNER JOIN regulatory_docs ON permits.permit_id = regulatory_docs.project_id INNER JOIN inspections ON permits.permit_id = inspections.project_id WHERE permits.expiration_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Permits;
SELECT project_id, permit_type, issue_date FROM Permits WHERE project_id = 100;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT permit_id, permit_type, issue_date, expiration_date FROM Permits WHERE issue_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT document_type, document_title, document_date FROM Regulatory_Documents WHERE document_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Permits WHERE issue_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT document_title, document_date FROM Regulatory_Documents WHERE document_type = 'Environmental';
SELECT project_name, compliance_status, last_check_date FROM Projects p JOIN Compliance_Status cs ON p.project_id = cs.project_id WHERE cs.permit_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT project_name, permit_type, issue_date, expiration_date FROM Projects p JOIN Permits pe ON p.project_id = pe.project_id WHERE permit_type LIKE '%Building%' ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Permits;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date FROM Projects WHERE project_location = 'New York';
SELECT permit_id, issue_date, expiration_date, permit_status FROM Permits WHERE permit_type = 'Building';
SELECT contractor_name, contractor_license, contractor_address FROM Contractors;
SELECT doc_id, document_type, document_date, document_status FROM ComplianceDocuments WHERE document_status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM Permits;
SELECT permit_id, permit_type, issue_date, expiration_date FROM Permits WHERE permit_status='Active';
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_manager FROM Projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT doc_id, document_type, document_date FROM ComplianceDocuments WHERE document_status='Approved' LIMIT 5;
SELECT contractor_name, contractor_phone, contractor_address FROM Contractors WHERE contractor_license IS NOT NULL;
